funFacts: My first program was a calculator that could only add numbers
I've written over 50,000 lines of Python code in the past year
I can solve a Rubik's cube in under 2 minutes
I've contributed to 15+ open source projects on GitHub
I built my first AI chatbot when I was 17
I once automated my entire college assignment submission process
I have a collection of 200+ programming books (mostly digital)
I can type at 120 WPM without looking at the keyboard

about.intro: Aspiring AIML engineer with a strong background in programming and web development. Motivated by problem-solving and dedicated to driving impactful solutions through innovation. Looking for opportunities to contribute to high-impact projects while expanding my skillset in a forward-thinking organization.
about.education: Currently pursuing a Bachelor of Engineering in Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning. I am passionate about the intersection of software engineering and cutting-edge AI technologies.

experience.title: Software Developer Intern
achievements: Worked on backend technologies and microservices using Spring Boot, FastAPI, and Express.
Designed and implemented automation solutions to streamline Business Analyst workflows, significantly reducing pre-sales task durations from weeks to minutes.

Developed cutting-edge AI-driven solutions leveraging large language models (LLMs) and AI Agents; engineered real-time interview platforms using LiveKit integrated with AI agents for dynamic, interactive experiences.

projects.title: Job Discovery Platform with Resume and Cover Letter Generation
projects.description: A website to scrape job listings from multiple platforms and generate automated resumes and cover letters using AI. The backend is built with Flask and includes secure authentication and a database for user data storage.
highlights: Built a website to scrape job listings from multiple websites like Intenshala, Naukri and Indeed
Developed backend with Flask and Flask-Login for smooth data flow and secure authentication.
Integrated a database for efficient user data storage
Added AI features for automated resume and cover letter generation.

projects.title: AI-Powered Presales Automation
projects.description: A system of microservices built with Express.js and FastAPI to automate presales tasks. It leverages LLMs for requirement analysis and integrates with Galileo AI and Selenium for UI/UX wireframe generation.
highlights: Built microservices using Express.js and FastAPI to automate presales tasks like requirement analysis and effort estimation
Automated Manual Analysis tasks from a week to 5 minutes.
Integrated LLMs for PDF-based feature extraction, user persona generation, and technical recommendations.

projects.title: Metro Management Microservices
projects.description: A distributed microservices backend for a metro management system, including user, metro, payment, and notification services. It uses Spring Boot, REST APIs, Kafka for event-driven communication, and Redis for performance optimization.
highlights: Developed a distributed microservices backend (User, Metro, Payment, Notification) using Spring Boot and REST APIs
Leveraged Kafka for event-driven communication
Optimized system performance through Redis caching
Integrated Java Mailer in Notification service for automated email alerts

projects.title: BeautyBuddy: Makeup and Beauty Chatbot
projects.description: An AI-powered chatbot with a FastAPI backend and Streamlit frontend. It uses LangGraph agents with LLMs and RAG models to classify and retrieve beauty information, and also includes a FAISS-based document retrieval system.
highlights: Developed an AI-powered chatbot integrating FastAPI backend and Streamlit frontend
Utilized LangGraph agents with LLMs and RAG models to classify and retrieve relevant beauty information
Implemented web scraping techniques to dynamically suggest beauty products acting as tool to AI Agent
Engineered FAISS-based document retrieval system to enhance query accuracy using embedded knowledge bases

projects.title: Serene Stays: Property Listing Website
projects.description: A comprehensive property listing website with a Node.js and Express backend. It uses MongoDB for data storage, Passport for user authentication, and the Mapbox API for interactive location services.
highlights: Developed a comprehensive property listing website for showcasing real estate listings
Created user authentication with Passport, and applied Mapbox API for interactive map-based location services

projects.title: Bollywood Movie Recommendation System
projects.description: A movie recommendation system that provides personalized suggestions. It uses Python with Pandas for data manipulation, CountVectorizer for text feature extraction, and a Streamlit frontend for a user-friendly experience.
highlights: Developed a movie recommendation system for personalized movie suggestions based on user preferences.
Implemented CountVectorizer for text feature extraction, optimizing the model's recommendation accuracy.
Created a Streamlit-based frontend to ensure an intuitive user experience.

projects.title: GlamSphere: Online Makeup Store
projects.description: An e-commerce platform for managing makeup products and transactions. It features a Node.js and Express backend, MySQL for secure database management, and a secure payment gateway integration.
highlights: Developed an e-commerce platform for managing makeup products and transactions
Integrated MySQL to ensure reliable and secure database management of product inventory
Developed a secure payment gateway using Razorpay, ensuring a safe transaction process for users

projects.title: Chat Server using Web Socket
projects.description: A real-time chat server built with Node.js and Express. It uses WebSocket and Socket.IO to enable instant and scalable communication between users.
highlights: Developed a real-time chat server to enable instant communication between users
Utilized WebSocket and Socket.IO to create a scalable and responsive chat platform for interactive user experiences

projects.title: Simon Says Game
projects.description: An interactive Simon Says memory game with dynamic game logic and a visually appealing user interface built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.
highlights: Developed an interactive Simon Says memory game for user engagement.
Integrated JavaScript for dynamic game logic and enhanced user interaction.

projects.title: Online Makeup Guide
projects.description: A makeup guide application developed in C that recommends products based on user inputs. It uses conditional statements and functions to provide personalized suggestions.
highlights: Developed a makeup guide application to recommend makeup products based on user inputs.
Applied conditional statements and functions to provide personalized product suggestions.

education.degree: B.E. in Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning

certifications.name: Supervised Machine Learning: Regression and Classification
Data Structures and Algorithms Using Java

achievements.title: KSCT Innovation Grant Recipient
achievements.description: The project 'Job Discovery Platform with Resume and Cover Letter Generation Using Generative AI' has been selected and funded by the Karnataka State Council for Science and Technology (KSCST) under the 48th series of the Student Project Programme (SPP) 2024-25.

responsibilities: Organized and led multiple competitive coding hackathons and workshops
Organized and managed events and competitions at inter-college fest, ensuring smooth execution of events
Planned and strategized marketing efforts for department fests to boost engagement and participation
